findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: Inadequate handling of non-ERC20-compliant tokens, specifically with the `transfer` function and the `approve` requirement to mitigate the known race condition.

findings.title: Incorrect Strategies Hash Update in _removeStrategyCalldata()
findings.description: The `strategiesHash` update logic fails to use the updated strategies to compute the hash when removing an existing strategy, instead using the stale list.

findings.title: Proper Function Type of RiskProviderRegistry::_setRisk()
findings.description: The helper routine `_setRisk()` is defined as `public` instead of `internal`, which can cause security issues.

findings.title: Improper Logic Of RewardDrip::updatePeriodFinish()
findings.description: Lack of necessary validation of timestamp argument to configure periodFinish may cause rewardPerToken() to revert and lock up all staked funds!

findings.title: Proper Fast Withdrawal Logic in _saveUserShares()
findings.description: The logic in the `_saveUserShares()` function of `FastWithdraw` contract overwrites the internal state `vaultWithdraw.proportionateDeposit`, which may cause an issue if the user makes multiple consecutive fast withdraw requests!

findings.title: Proper Reallocation Logic in _processWithdraw()
findings.description: The `_processWithdraw()` function incorrectly provides arguments for redistribution of withdrawn assets to other strategies for immediate deposits.

findings.title: Improved Bitwise Operations in Helper Library
findings.description: The bitwise library can be improved by properly extracting and setting bit fields without implicit assumptions.

findings.title: Enhanced Validation of Function Arguments
findings.description: DeFi protocols typically have a number of system- wide parameters that can be dynamically configured on demand.

findings.title: Proper Strategy Removal Logic in notifyStrategyRemoved()
findings.description: The proportions-adjusting logic has a mis-calculation at line 610. The new proportions need to be updated with the iteration for all remaining strategies ( `j` ), instead of the one being removed ( `i` ).
